Description: Fragment with profile of Attic black-glaze pottery bowl with broad ring foot, concave wall and heavy lip in two degrees. Glazed save for stand-surface. Incised inscription.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 536)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1869)
